title: 追放勇者の優雅な生活 ～自由になったら俺だけの最愛天使も手に入った！～
url: https://jmanga.se/read/追放勇者の優雅な生活-～自由になったら俺だけの最愛天使も手に入った！～-raw/
summary:
追放勇者の優雅な生活 ～自由になったら俺だけの最愛天使も手に入った！～ raw,追放勇者の優雅な生活 ～自由になったら俺だけの最愛天使も手に入った！～ zip,追放勇者の優雅な生活 ～自由になったら俺だけの最愛天使も手に入った！～ manga								TSUIHO YUSHA NO YUGANA SEIKATSU (SLOW LIFE) JIYU NI NATTARA ORE DAKE NO SAIAI TENSHI MO TE NI HAITTA!

Alec was at a loss when he was suddenly fired from his position as a hero after 30 years of service in the kingdom. He was suddenly thrown out into the world with no common sense. He wondered what to do and came up with a plan: "Yes! Get a slave with common sense that you don’t have! And he did. And that is how he met Sister Lilicia, a simple but beautiful woman. Having found a kind-hearted Lilithia, Alec has learned to love her, and he decides to live happily ever after as an adventurer for her sake. Meanwhile, a new team of heroes has been formed in the kingdom where Alec was banished, but they are having trouble defeating even a simple defeat. This adventure tale tells of the love and new life of an exiled former brave who is now free!
